scenes.description: MC section where Koseki Bijou transitions from being inside an arcade machine to the stage, preparing for her performance.
Live performance of 'This game' by Koseki Bijou.

subtitles.original: Wait, how'd I get out? Okay.
subtitles.english: Wait, how'd I get out? Okay.

subtitles.original: Okay, I got it then.
subtitles.english: Okay, I got it then.

subtitles.original: I'm gonna sing and dance a song right now!
subtitles.english: I'm gonna sing and dance a song right now!

subtitles.original: Here we go!
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: This game!
subtitles.english: This game!

subtitles.original:
This game
Lyrics: 勇気真由美 Music: 若林充
subtitles.english:
This game
Lyrics: Mayumi Yuuki Music: Mitsuru Wakabayashi

subtitles.original: 回り続ける
subtitles.english: Revolving endlessly

subtitles.original: 歯車にはなり下がらない
subtitles.english: I won't settle for being just another gear

subtitles.original: 平均演じる
subtitles.english: Playing the part of average

subtitles.original: 誕生から始まった地獄
subtitles.english: Hell that began from birth

subtitles.original: 遊び半分で 神々導いた
subtitles.english: Half in jest, led by the gods

subtitles.original: 盤上の世界 No No No Game No Life
subtitles.english: To a world on a game board, No No No Game No Life

subtitles.original: ぬるい平穏を ばっさり切り捨てて
subtitles.english: Casting aside lukewarm peace

subtitles.original: 栄光の階段に存在刻むんだ
subtitles.english: I'll carve my existence into the stairs of glory

subtitles.original: 目に映るのは 完全勝利の運命
subtitles.english: What I see is the destiny of total victory

subtitles.original: 何もかも 計算どおり
subtitles.english: Everything is exactly as calculated

subtitles.original: 変えてやる 染まらない空白で
subtitles.english: I'll change it with an unstainable Blank

subtitles.original: We are maverick 救済なんていらない
subtitles.english: We are maverick, we don't need salvation

subtitles.original: どんな不条理も 勝てばいいだけの話
subtitles.english: No matter the absurdity, it's just a matter of winning

subtitles.original: 最後の駆け引きと 才能が無敗誘う
subtitles.english: The final stratagem and talent invite invincibility

subtitles.original: 生まれ堕ちた日に誓った 楽しむさ
subtitles.english: I swore on the day I was born to enjoy it

subtitles.original: 自分だけの道を 自分信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe in myself on my own path

subtitles.original: 心底に潜む
subtitles.english: Lurking in the depths of my heart

subtitles.original: 闇より強い愛ではない
subtitles.english: Is not a love stronger than darkness

subtitles.original: 挫ける限り
subtitles.english: As long as I don't falter

subtitles.original: そこに敗北はありえない
subtitles.english: Defeat is impossible there

subtitles.original: 上辺の個体で 安心と引き換えに
subtitles.english: In exchange for security with a superficial existence

subtitles.original: プライド殺すな No No No Sense of Life
subtitles.english: Don't kill your pride, No No No Sense of Life

subtitles.original: 野蛮な雑音を きっぱり拒絶して
subtitles.english: Flatly rejecting the barbaric noise

subtitles.original: 誰より純粋な声上げるんだ
subtitles.english: I'll raise a voice purer than anyone's

subtitles.original: 戦うことは きっと間違いじゃない
subtitles.english: Fighting is surely not a mistake

subtitles.original: 手応えが 教えてくれた
subtitles.english: The feedback told me so

subtitles.original: 全て失っても 勝ち残れ
subtitles.english: Even if I lose everything, I'll survive and win

subtitles.original: We are maverick 常識なんていらない
subtitles.english: We are maverick, we don't need common sense

subtitles.original: 前ならえ向かう 先に待ってるのは退屈
subtitles.english: What awaits ahead of following the crowd is boredom

subtitles.original: 誰かの言いなりじゃ つまらない 挑んでやる
subtitles.english: It's boring to just do as told, I'll challenge it

subtitles.original: 生まれ堕ちた日を誇りにして
subtitles.english: Taking pride in the day I was born

subtitles.original: 自分だけの道を 最後まで
subtitles.english: My own path until the end

subtitles.original: 迷わない 選ばれし者の
subtitles.english: Without hesitation, even if it's the

subtitles.original: 真っ赤な自惚れでも
subtitles.english: Deep-red conceit of the chosen one

subtitles.original: 誇らしく 生き抜くための
subtitles.english: Because I only know one way

subtitles.original: 方法をひとつしか知らないから
subtitles.english: To live through it proudly

subtitles.original: We are maverick 救済なんていらない
subtitles.english: We are maverick, we don't need salvation

subtitles.original: どんな不条理も 勝てばいいだけの話
subtitles.english: No matter the absurdity, it's just a matter of winning

subtitles.original: 最後の駆け引きと 才能が無敗誘う
subtitles.english: The final stratagem and talent invite invincibility

subtitles.original: 生まれ堕ちた日に誓った 楽しむさ
subtitles.english: I swore on the day I was born to enjoy it

subtitles.original: この世界手にして 笑うんだ
subtitles.english: I'll take this world in my hands and laugh

subtitles.original: We are maverick 最強の名ばかりゲーマー
subtitles.english: We are maverick, the strongest gamers in name only

subtitles.original: 空白ならば 何物にも 何物にもなれる
subtitles.english: If we are Blank, we can become anything, anything

subtitles.original: 自分だけの道を 自分信じてる
subtitles.english: I believe in myself on my own path
